verses.verse: קְֽרָא־ <WH7121> Call נָ֭א <WH4994> now הֲיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> now if there be עוֹנֶ֑ךָּ <WH6030> any that will answer וְאֶל־ <WH413> to מִ֖י <WH4310> which מִקְּדֹשִׁ֣ים <WH6918> thee and to which of the saints תִּפְנֶֽה׃ <WH6437> wilt thou turn
כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for לֶֽ֭אֱוִיל <WH191> the foolish man יַהֲרָג־ <WH2026> killeth כָּ֑עַשׂ <WH3708> For wrath וּ֝פֹתֶ֗ה <WH6601> the silly one תָּמִ֥ית <WH4191> slayeth קִנְאָֽה׃ <WH7068> and envy

אֲ‍ֽנִי־ <WH589> I רָ֭אִיתִי <WH7200> I have seen אֱוִ֣יל <WH191> the foolish מַשְׁרִ֑ישׁ <WH8327> taking root וָאֶקּ֖וֹב <WH5344> I cursed נָוֵ֣הוּ <WH5116> his habitation פִתְאֹֽם׃ <WH6597> but suddenly

יִרְחֲק֣וּ <WH7368> are far בָנָ֣יו <WH1121> His children מִיֶּ֑שַׁע <WH3468> from safety וְיִֽדַּכְּא֥וּ <WH1792> and they are crushed בַ֝שַּׁ֗עַר <WH8179> in the gate וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> and there מַצִּֽיל׃ <WH5337> neither [is there] any to deliver

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after קְצִיר֨וֹ ׀ <WH7105> Whose harvest רָ֘עֵ֤ב <WH7456> famish יֹאכֵ֗ל <WH398> eateth up וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> it even out מִצִּנִּ֥ים <WH6791> of the thorns יִקָּחֵ֑הוּ <WH3947> and taketh וְשָׁאַ֖ף <WH7602> swalloweth up צַמִּ֣ים <WH6782> and the robber חֵילָֽם׃ <WH2428> their substance

כִּ֤י ׀ <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יֵצֵ֣א <WH3318> cometh not forth מֵעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> of the dust אָ֑וֶן <WH205> Although affliction וּ֝מֵאֲדָמָ֗ה <WH127> of the ground לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor יִצְמַ֥ח <WH6779> spring out עָמָֽל׃ <WH5999> neither doth trouble

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For אָ֭דָם <WH120> Yet man לְעָמָ֣ל <WH5999> unto trouble יוּלָּ֑ד <WH3205> is born וּבְנֵי־ <WH1121> afflicted רֶ֝֗שֶׁף <WH7565> arrow יַגְבִּ֥יהוּ <WH1361> upward עֽוּף׃ <WH5774> fly

אוּלָ֗ם <WH199> for אֲ֭נִי <WH589> Me אֶדְרֹ֣שׁ <WH1875> seek אֶל־ <WH413> before אֵ֑ל <WH410> unto God וְאֶל־ <WH413> before אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> and unto God אָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> would I commit דִּבְרָתִֽי׃ <WH1700> my cause

עֹשֶׂ֣ה <WH6213> Which doeth גְ֭דֹלוֹת <WH1419> great things וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> else חֵ֑קֶר <WH2714> things נִ֝פְלָא֗וֹת <WH6381> marvellous things עַד־ <WH5704> against אֵ֥ין <WH369> else מִסְפָּֽר׃ <WH4557> without number

הַנֹּתֵ֣ן <WH5414> Who giveth מָ֭טָר <WH4306> rain עַל־ <WH5921> up פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> upon אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the earth וְשֹׁ֥לֵֽחַ <WH7971> and sendeth מַ֝יִם <WH4325> waters עַל־ <WH5921> up פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon חוּצֽוֹת׃ <WH2351> the fields
לָשׂ֣וּם <WH7760> To set up שְׁפָלִ֣ים <WH8217> those that be low לְמָר֑וֹם <WH4791> on high וְ֝קֹדְרִ֗ים <WH6937> that those which mourn שָׂ֣גְבוּ <WH7682> may be exalted יֶֽשַׁע׃ <WH3468> to safety

מֵ֭פֵר <WH6565> He disappointeth מַחְשְׁב֣וֹת <WH4284> the devices עֲרוּמִ֑ים <WH6175> of the crafty וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> cannot תַעֲשֶׂ֥ינָה <WH6213> cannot perform יְ֝דֵיהֶ֗ם <WH3027> so that their hands תּוּשִׁיָּֽה׃ <WH8454> [their] enterprise

לֹכֵ֣ד <WH3920> He taketh חֲכָמִ֣ים <WH2450> the wise בְּעָרְמָ֑ם <WH6193> in their own craftiness וַעֲצַ֖ת <WH6098> and the counsel נִפְתָּלִ֣ים <WH6617> of the froward נִמְהָֽרָה׃ <WH4116> is carried headlong

יוֹמָ֥ם <WH3119> in the daytime יְפַגְּשׁוּ־ <WH6298> They meet חֹ֑שֶׁךְ <WH2822> with darkness וְ֝כַלַּ֗יְלָה <WH3915> as in the night יְֽמַשְׁשׁ֥וּ <WH4959> and grope בַֽצָּהֳרָֽיִם׃ <WH6672> in the noonday
וַיֹּ֣שַׁע <WH3467> But he saveth מֵ֭חֶרֶב <WH2719> from the sword מִפִּיהֶ֑ם <WH6310> from their mouth וּמִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> and from the hand חָזָ֣ק <WH2389> of the mighty אֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <WH34> the poor
וַתְּהִ֣י <WH1961> has לַדַּ֣ל <WH1800> So the poor תִּקְוָ֑ה <WH8615> hath hope וְ֝עֹלָ֗תָה <WH5766> and iniquity קָ֣פְצָה <WH7092> stoppeth פִּֽיהָ׃ <WH6310> her mouth

הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> Behold happy אֱ֭נוֹשׁ <WH582> [is] the man יוֹכִחֶ֣נּֽוּ <WH3198> correcteth אֱל֑וֹהַּ <WH433> whom God וּמוּסַ֥ר <WH4148> not thou the chastening שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <WH7706> of the Almighty אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּמְאָֽס׃ <WH3988> therefore despise

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for ה֣וּא <WH1931> He יַכְאִ֣יב <WH3510> For he maketh sore וְיֶחְבָּ֑שׁ <WH2280> and bindeth up יִ֝מְחַ֗ץ <WH4272> he woundeth [וְיָדֹו כ] (וְיָדָ֥יו <WH3027> able ק) תִּרְפֶּֽינָה׃ <WH7495> make whole

בְּשֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> thee in six צָ֭רוֹת <WH6869> troubles יַצִּילֶ֑ךָּ <WH5337> He shall deliver וּבְשֶׁ֓בַע ׀ <WH7651> yea in seven לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יִגַּ֖ע <WH5060> touch בְּךָ֣ רָֽע׃ <WH7451> there shall no evil
בְּ֭רָעָב <WH7458> In famine פָּֽדְךָ֣ <WH6299> he shall redeem מִמָּ֑וֶת <WH4194> thee from death וּ֝בְמִלְחָמָ֗ה <WH4421> and in war מִ֣ידֵי <WH3027> from the power חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> of the sword

בְּשׁ֣וֹט <WH7752> from the scourge לָ֭שׁוֹן <WH3956> of the tongue תֵּחָבֵ֑א <WH2244> Thou shalt be hid וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> and you תִירָ֥א <WH3372> neither shalt thou be afraid מִ֝שֹּׁ֗ד <WH7701> of destruction כִּ֣י <WH3588> when יָבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> when it cometh

לְשֹׁ֣ד <WH7701> At destruction וּלְכָפָ֣ן <WH3720> and famine תִּשְׂחָ֑ק <WH7832> thou shalt laugh וּֽמֵחַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> of the beasts הָ֝אָ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the earth אַל־ <WH408> nay תִּירָֽא׃ <WH3372> neither shalt thou be afraid

כִּ֤י <WH3588> for עִם־ <WH5973> with אַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> with the stones הַשָּׂדֶ֣ה <WH7704> of the field בְרִיתֶ֑ךָ <WH1285> For thou shalt be in league וְחַיַּ֥ת <WH2416> and the beasts הַ֝שָּׂדֶ֗ה <WH7704> of the field הָשְׁלְמָה־ <WH7999> shall be at peace לָֽךְ׃

וְֽ֭יָדַעְתָּ <WH3045> And thou shalt know כִּי־ <WH3588> for שָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> [shall be] in peace אָהֳלֶ֑ךָ <WH168> that thy tabernacle וּֽפָקַדְתָּ֥ <WH6485> and thou shalt visit נָ֝וְךָ <WH5116> thy habitation וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> no תֶחֱטָֽא׃ <WH2398> and shalt not sin

וְֽ֭יָדַעְתָּ <WH3045> Thou shalt know כִּי־ <WH3588> for רַ֣ב <WH7227> [shall be] great זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <WH2233> also that thy seed וְ֝צֶאֱצָאֶ֗יךָ <WH6631> and thine offspring כְּעֵ֣שֶׂב <WH6212> as the grass הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

תָּב֣וֹא <WH935> Thou shalt come בְכֶ֣לַח <WH3624> in a full age אֱלֵי־ <WH413> to קָ֑בֶר <WH6913> to [thy] grave כַּעֲל֖וֹת <WH5927> cometh in גָּדִ֣ישׁ <WH1430> like as a shock of corn בְּעִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH6256> in his season

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> Behold זֹ֭את <WH2063> we חֲקַרְנ֥וּהָ <WH2713> Lo this we have searched כֶּֽן־ <WH3651> it so הִ֑יא <WH1931> it שְׁ֝מָעֶ֗נָּה <WH8085> it so it [is] hear וְאַתָּ֥ה <WH859> it דַֽע־ <WH3045> it and know לָֽךְ׃ פ
